definitions: a person who seeks to cure diseases or heal injuries by means other than conventional medical treatment

examples.text: his parents consulted a traditional healer for help

shortDefinitions: person who seeks to cure diseases

definitions: a person or thing that mends or repairs something

examples.text: aloe vera is a superb healer of the alimentary canal

shortDefinitions: person or thing that mends or repairs something

definitions: something that alleviates distress or anguish

examples.text: a dog is a great healer in every way

shortDefinitions: something that alleviates person's distress or anguish
